mapper.insert: /* Device.insertDeviceInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_EQPMNT_INFO_M (mbr_sn, eqpmnt_info_sn, eqpmnt_type_ct, eqpmnt_cntn_addr, eqpmnt_cntn_port, eqpmnt_nm, eqpmnt_id, eqpmnt_pswd, eqpmnt_serial_no, eqpmnt_safety_cd) VALUES ( #{mbr_sn}, #{eqpmnt_info_sn}, #{eqpmnt_type_ct}, #{eqpmnt_cntn_addr}, #{eqpmnt_cntn_port}, #{eqpmnt_nm}, #{eqpmnt_id}, #{eqpmnt_pswd}, #{eqpmnt_serial_no}, #{eqpmnt_safety_cd} )
mapper.select: /* Device.selectDeviceList */ SELECT eqpmnt_info_sn, eqpmnt_type_ct, eqpmnt_cntn_addr, eqpmnt_cntn_port, eqpmnt_nm, eqpmnt_id, eqpmnt_pswd, mbr_sn, fvrt_stng_yn FROM TB_EQPMNT_INFO_M WHERE mbr_sn= #{mbr_sn} ORDER BY fvrt_stng_yn DESC

/* Device.selectFavrtLst */ SELECT eqpmnt_info_sn, eqpmnt_type_ct, eqpmnt_cntn_addr, eqpmnt_cntn_port, eqpmnt_nm, eqpmnt_id, eqpmnt_pswd, mbr_sn, fvrt_stng_yn FROM TB_EQPMNT_INFO_M WHERE mbr_sn= #{mbr_sn}
mapper.insert: /* Device.insertShrDevice */ INSERT INTO TB_MBR_SHR_M (mbr_sn, shr_mbr_sn, eqpmnt_info_sn, eqpmnt_shr_role, eqpmnt_shr_req_tm) VALUES ( #{mbr_sn}, #{shr_mbr_sn}, #{eqpmnt_info_sn}, #{eqpmnt_shr_role}, now() )
mapper.select: /* Device.selectDupRDeviceInfo */ SELECT dupChk FROM ( SELECT 'Y' dupChk, COUNT(*) cnt FROM TB_EQPMNT_CERT_INFO_M WHERE eqpmnt_info_sn = #{eqpmnt_info_sn} UNION SELECT 'N' dupChk, 1 ) a where cnt > 0 order by dupChk desc limit 1

/* Device.selectDeviceInfo */ SELECT e.mbr_sn, e.eqpmnt_info_sn, e.eqpmnt_type_ct, e.eqpmnt_cntn_addr, e.eqpmnt_cntn_port, e.eqpmnt_nm, e.fvrt_stng_yn, e.eqpmnt_serial_no, e.eqpmnt_safety_cd, m.eml_addr FROM TB_EQPMNT_INFO_M e LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MBR_INFO_M m ON e.mbr_sn = m.mbr_sn WHERE eqpmnt_info_sn = #{eqpmnt_info_sn}
